comments.author: Dave
comments.body: No me today. Hoofin' it downtown this morning, then bailing. Dr. No and I zipped up Super Sunshine yesterday. One of the better Super's, I have to say. Perfect weather and huge piles of snow along the road. Primo! DU

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: I'm going to try and get out before Kev's meeting at 1, but I'm not entirely sure on the where/when aspect
